description:
In this video, I dive deep into the fascinating history of Sony's PlayStation Portable. I explore how this powerful handheld challenged Nintendo's dominance and revolutionized portable gaming, despite ultimately falling short of the DS's success. From its innovative hardware to its controversial marketing, I uncover the PSP's legacy and its impact on gaming.

Subscribe for more! https://www.youtube.com/austinevans
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@austintechtips
Instagram: https://instagram.com/austinnotduncan
Twitter: https://twitter.com/austinnotduncan
Threads: https://www.threads.net/@austinnotduncan

Chapter Titles:
0:00 PlayStation Goes Portable
1:11 Nintendo Factor
3:23 The PSP is Born
5:25 Multimedia
6:30 Launch
7:55 Hardware Evolution
12:37 Dev Kit
14:16 PSP vs DS
15:57 Controversy 
17:45 Legacy
title: I bought EVERY PSP
